mapper.select: SELECT t.*,ar.agentType FROM agy_account t LEFT JOIN (SELECT MAX(depth) agentType,childnodeid FROM agy_tree GROUP by childnodeid) ar ON ar.childnodeid = t.id WHERE t.status = 1 AND t.attributes = 0 AND ar.agentType > 0 AND ar.agentType < 4

SELECT e.* from agy_tree e LEFT JOIN (SELECT max(depth) agentType,childnodeid from agy_tree GROUP by childnodeid) ar ON ar.childnodeid = e.parentid where e.childnodeid=#{childnodeid} and ar.agentType >0 and ar.agentType < 4 and e.parentid !=#{childnodeid} ORDER BY e.depth desc
SELECT count(*) FROM agy_commission_profit WHERE agentid =#{agentid} and date_format(time,'%Y-%m')=#{time}
